H0.text: Cells are what all matter is made up of.

H1.text: Atoms are what all matter is made up of.

H2.text: Molecules are what all matter is made up of.

A4.text: Atoms are the basic particles of the chemical elements and the fundamental building blocks of matter.

A5.text: Atoms can also combine to create materials that do not consist of discrete molecules, including crystals and liquid or solid metals.
